column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=1. Introduction
#Text=Bone disorders , especially osteoporosis , are becoming increasingly prevalent as the aging population grows , and bone fractures also occur frequently .
#Text=Osteoporosis contributes significantly to global healthcare costs , and the treatment of osteoporosis remains a great challenge .
#Text=Thus , new bone anabolic drugs need to be developed for the prevention and treatment of osteoporosis .
#Text=Bone morphogenetic protein 2 ( BMP2 ) is one of the most important growth factors that induce osteoblast differentiation and stimulate bone or cartilage formation .
#Text=BMP2 has been widely used in the clinic to promote bone formation .
#Text=However , the therapeutic dose of BMP2 is very expensive , and there are some life-threatening side effects that can occur with larger doses .
#Text=Hence , it is necessary to find additional agents or methods for the improvement of BMP2 itself to intensify the osteogenic effects of BMP2 .
#Text=The combination of BMP2 and these small molecules can promote BMP2-mediated osteoblast differentiation and reduces the risk of its side effects in the treatment of bone diseases .
#Text=From a clinical perspective , these small molecules that regulate BMP2 activity provide powerful tools for the treatment of osteoporosis and fracture repair .
#Text=Icariin ( ICA ) ( the chemical structure is shown in
#Text=Figure 1

#Text=) is the main active flavonoid glucoside from herbs of the genus Epimedium ; these herbs are used in traditional Chinese medicine and have long been prescribed for the treatment of bone fractures and osteoporosis as a bone-protecting agent .

#Text=In addition to promoting bone regeneration and repair , ICA also has many beneficial pharmacological and biological activities , including neuroprotective effects ; protective effects against atherosclerosis ; antitumor effects ; anti-inflammatory and antioxidant effects ; and improved sexual function effects .
#Text=Several animal and cell studies have shown that treatment with ICA can increase osteogenic differentiation and reduce bone loss in vivo and in vitro .
#Text=The extremely low cost of ICA and its strong bone regenerative effects indicate its potential in clinical applications .
#Text=The cAMP/PKA/CREB axis is a vital pathway that regulates osteogenic differentiation and mineralization .
#Text=Several previous studies have reported that PTH affects osteoblastic cells by activating the cAMP/PKA/CREB axis .

#Text=Several studies have reported that pretreatment of human mesenchymal stem cells ( MSCs ) with cAMP analogs , adenylate cyclase activators or phosphodiesterase inhibitors can enhance bone formation .
#Text=In the present study , we combined ICA and BMP2 to promote osteogenesis for the first time .
#Text=We aimed to determine whether ICA could enhance the osteogenic induction of BMP2 in C2C12 cells .
#Text=We concluded that the combination of ICA and BMP2 could promote BMP2-mediated osteoblast differentiation in a dose-dependent manner .
#Text=We also found that ICA stimulates BMP2-mediated osteogenesis by activating the cAMP/PKA/CREB signaling pathway .
#Text=Therefore , ICA is a promising candidate as an alternative for BMP2 or as a promoter for enhancing the therapeutic effects of BMP2 .
#Text=This combination will reduce the risk of side effects from BMP2 in the treatment of bone diseases such as osteoporosis .
